info.name: Activator_Smoke_Test
info.description: Smoke test for the activator / shelf.

item.name: Add wrong Content-Type Test Knowledge Object to the shelf
Add Missing Payload Body Test Knowledge Object to the shelf

exec: tests["Adds bad KO to shelf"] = responseBody === "Object ark:/99999/badBody added to the shelf";

item.name: Execute no Payload KO with test case

exec: tests["KO has no payload"] = jsonData.message === 'Knowledge object payload content is NULL or empty';

item.name: Add correct Test Knowledge Object to the shelf

exec: tests["Object Add Operation"] = responseBody.has("Object ark:/99999/fk4rf60z9w added to the shelf");

item.name: Execute KO with extra arguments test case

exec: tests["KO has too many arguments"] = jsonData.message === "Error in converting RDF ioSpec for ko: Number of input parameters should be 1.";

item.name: Execute KO with wrong argument name test case

exec: tests["KO has missing argument"] = jsonData.message === "Error in converting RDF ioSpec for ko:  Input parameter DrugIDs is missing.";

item.name: Execute KO with wrong input type test case

exec: tests["Input is wrong type"] = jsonData.message.has("Error while executing payload code Traceback");

item.name: Retrieve the list of KOs on the shelf
Add Test Knowledge Object to the shelf

exec: tests["Object Add Operation"] = responseBody.has("Object ark:/99999/fk4rf60z9w added to the shelf");

item.name: Retrieve the list of KOs on the shelf - return 1

exec: tests["Response indicates object is not there"] = responseBody === "Object with ArkId ark:/99999/fk4rf60z9w no longer on the user shelf"

item.name: Re-add Test Knowledge Object to the shelf

exec: tests["Object Add Operation"] = responseBody.has("Object ark:/99999/fk4rf60z9w added to the shelf");

item.name: Retrieve the detail of a KO on the shelf (with test)

exec: tests["Payload Content is not null"] = jsonData.payload.content !== null;
tests["Input Message is not null"] = jsonData.inputMessage !== null;
tests["Output Message is not null"] = jsonData.outputMessage !== null;

item.name: Add Test Built-In Overriding Knowledge Object to the shelf

exec: tests["Object Add Operation"] = responseBody.has("Object ark:/prescription/counter added to the shelf, overriding existing built-in object.");

item.name: Remove Test Built-In Overriding Knowledge Object to the shelf

exec: tests["Object Remove Operation"] = responseBody.has("Object with ArkId ark:/prescription/counter no longer on the user shelf built-in object now exposed.");
tests["Object Remove Operation"] = responseBody.has("Object with ArkId ark:/prescription/counter no longer on the user shelf");
